entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
